Name: MDX_Sales_Group_Domaine_Co_level0
Expression: {FILTER(TM1FILTERBYLEVEL(TM1SUBSETALL([SLS_CUSTOMER]) , 0) , ((([SLS_CUSTOMER].[Sales Group Name] = [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Sales Group])) AND ([SLS_CUSTOMER].[Distribution Channel Name] = [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Distribution Channel]))) AND ([SLS_CUSTOMER].[Sales Organisation Name] = [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Sales Organisation]))) AND ([SLS_CUSTOMER].[Division Name] = [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Division])))}
